text: Nick A. Khouri served as the 46th Treasurer of Michigan. ==Education== Khouri earned a B.A. in economics from the University of Michigan and an M.A. in the same subject from Michigan State University. ==Career== Khouri previously served as Chief Economist to the Michigan Senate Fiscal Agency. Khouri served as Chief Deputy Michigan State Treasurer under Michigan State Treasurer Douglas B. Roberts from 1991 to 1997. In April 2015, Khouri served as Michigan State Treasurer after being appointed by Governor Rick Snyder until his resignation in 2018. On December 13, 2019, Detroit Mayor Mike Duggan appointed Khouri as the city's economic development chief. Khouri assumed this position on January 1, 2020. ==References== Category:Living people Category:State treasurers of Michigan Category:Michigan State University alumni Category:University of Michigan alumni Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Nick Khouri
